alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 3:09AM EST until January 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts of up to 35 mph are expected this morning, which could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory is issued when strong winds will combine with cold temperatures for several hours to create dangerously cold conditions for exposed skin. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
